attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to make recommendations to Her Majesty The Queen (or whoever is in a position to bring this about) to remove peerages to those MP's who have brought the political system into disrepute by false claims or claiming outside the spirit of the agreement

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
